**Notice: Changes to the Exam Schedule**

Dear Students,

We hereby wish to inform you about important updates to the exam schedule for the upcoming examination period.

Due to organizational adjustments, some exam dates and locations for specific modules have been altered. We strongly advise all students to check these changes immediately to verify any impact on their individual exam times.

The **updated and binding exam schedule** is now available on the official university website at the following link:
[Link to Examinations Office/Exam Schedule Website]

It is the responsibility of each student to regularly check the updated schedule for possible changes. Individual notifications regarding these changes will not be sent separately.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Sincerely,

The Examinations Office
